slides.narrative: Open with a clean, professional cover that establishes brand identity. The tagline immediately communicates the value proposition. Keep it simple - this slide should make a strong first impression without overwhelming.

visual_direction.background: White or subtle gradient (white to light indigo)
visual_direction.typography: Plus Jakarta Sans for headline, Inter for subtext

slides.title: The Problem

content.headline: Aesthetic Clinics Are Losing Money Every Day
bullet_points: Leads arrive via Instagram DMs and WhatsApp - chaotic, untracked
No CRM adoption - tools like Salesforce are too complex and expensive
Leads get lost in chat history - slow responses mean lost sales
No follow-up system - potential customers go to competitors
Zero visibility - owners don't know their conversion rate
content.statistic: 70% of leads go cold due to slow follow-up
content.quote: "I know I'm losing money. By the time I respond to DMs, they've already booked somewhere else." â€” Clinic Owner

slides.narrative: Paint a vivid picture of the pain. Every aesthetic clinic owner recognizes these problems - the chaos of managing leads across multiple messaging apps, the frustration of lost opportunities. Use the statistic and quote to add credibility and emotional resonance. The audience should be nodding along.

visual_direction.layout: Left side: bullet points. Right side: supporting visual
visual_direction.visual_suggestion: Illustration of overflowing phone notifications, or split showing chaos vs. missed opportunity
visual_direction.colors: Dark text on light background, red accent for pain points
visual_direction.icons: Use warning/alert icons next to each bullet

slides.title: The Opportunity

content.headline: A $15B Market Without a Clear Leader
bullet_points: 50,000+ aesthetic clinics in the US alone
Growing 8% annually as beauty industry expands
Most clinics use NO CRM - or inappropriate enterprise tools
Instagram & WhatsApp are primary lead channels - no existing solution serves them

slides.narrative: Transition from problem to opportunity. Show that this isn't a niche - it's a substantial market with clear growth trends. Emphasize the gap: clinics are using social media for leads but have no tools designed for this workflow. This is blue ocean territory.

visual_direction.layout: Market size pyramid or concentric circles (TAM > SAM > SOM)
visual_direction.chart: Simple bar or area chart showing market growth
visual_direction.colors: Brand indigo for primary data points, supporting grays

slides.title: Introducing Clinic

content.headline: The Mobile CRM Built for Aesthetic Clinics
content.value_proposition: Clinic organizes your leads, reminds you of follow-ups, and helps you close more sales from Instagram and WhatsApp.
key_points: Mobile-first - works entirely from your phone
Built for social leads - designed around Instagram & WhatsApp
Visual pipeline - Kanban board for instant overview
Automated reminders - never miss a follow-up
Simple setup - running in 5 minutes, no training needed

slides.narrative: Introduce the solution clearly and confidently. Clinic isn't just another CRM - it's purpose-built for this specific use case. Emphasize the differentiation: mobile-first (not mobile-adapted), social-native, radically simple. The value proposition should stick in their minds.

visual_direction.layout: Headline + value prop on left, phone mockup on right
visual_direction.mockup: iPhone showing Clinic dashboard or Kanban board

steps.title: Capture

steps.title: Track

steps.title: Close
steps.description: Get reminders to follow up. Click-to-chat directly from the app. Convert more leads into customers.

slides.narrative: Break down the user journey into simple, digestible steps. Investors/buyers want to understand the workflow quickly. Use this slide to demonstrate that Clinic isn't complicated - it's intuitive and fits into existing behaviors.

visual_direction.layout: Three columns, each with icon, number, title, description
visual_direction.flow: Left to right progression with subtle arrows or connecting lines
visual_direction.colors: Numbers in brand primary, icons in gray or primary

slides.title: Let's Connect

content.headline_investor: Join Us in Transforming How Clinics Sell

slides.narrative: End with a clear call to action. For investors: schedule a meeting, continue the conversation. For sales prospects: start a trial or see a demo. Make it easy to take the next step. Include contact information prominently.

for_investors: Focus on traction and early metrics (if available)
Discuss team background and why you'll win
Be prepared for questions on CAC, LTV, churn
Have a clear ask (funding amount, use of funds)
for_sales: Lead with pain points they recognize
Show the product demo live if possible
Emphasize ease of setup and free trial
End with special offer if appropriate (extended trial, discount)
general: Keep slides clean - don't read from them
Spend more time on Problem and Solution

design_specifications.logo_placement: Bottom right corner (small) on all slides except cover and CTA
